column2: This will request a grant from other players. Please note they must have choosen the decision to enable giving grants for the request to go through. It can be reversed at any time.
This will prohibit other players from giving us grants. It can be reversed at any time.
Enable Giving Grants and Lend Lease

This will allow us to give grants and lend lease to other players. It must be activated before a player chooses to request grants or lend lease. It can be reversed at any time.\n§RSending lend lease (military/industrial goods to other players) will be unlocked after you reseach Economic Responsibility.§!
Disable Giving Grants and Lend Lease

This will prevent us from getting events when other players request grants and lend lease requests. It can be reversed at any time.\n§RSending lend lease (military/industrial goods to other players) will be unlocked after you reseach Economic Responsibility.§!
